name: ort
description: Automatic spelling correction for Polish language, both in wikicode and plaintext
author: Piotr Kubowicz <derbeth@interia.pl> (https://github.com/Derbeth)

scripts.test: rm -rf tmp/ && npm run check && npm run compile && babel test/browser.js -d tmp/ && karma start --single-run && node test/texts.js
scripts.texts: npm run check && npm run compile && node test/texts.js
scripts.coverage: eslint src && npm run compile && nyc --reporter=html node test/texts.js
scripts.karma: npm run check && babel test/browser.js -d tmp/ && karma start --single-run
scripts.prepare: npm run check && npm run compile

browserslist: > 1% in PL, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead
